name: Zombie Mansion (Imixari, Veiq)
description:
Fight hordes of zombies that are invading your mansion!
Made by Imixari and Veiq for https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-110-sacrifice

Hold LMB and drag to select units
RMB to give orders (move, attack, interact)
SPACE to activate slowmotion
TAB to switch weapons
